name: From the Roots Up
description:
It may take some time for the game to run. Please wait From the Roots Up

Well, we came from somewhere, but like,

from where? How? Who was my ancestor's ancestors? Were they cool? Did they have fings? Maybe teeth? OH, claws!! We've definitely had claws!!

What if we evolved differently? What would it have looked like?

This is our team Penguin Lovers Association's Global Game Jam 2023 entry for the theme 'Roots'.

All of our assets and code have been made on our site within the 48 hours.

Developer - Barış Sinaplı

Developer - Irmak Erkol

Developer-Musician - Fatma Sena Genç

Designer-Opening animation - İshak Öztürk

Assets - Yağmur Yılmaz

UI - Sena Tunç
